ygData.subject: Re: morning, and my apologies
ygData.msgSnippet: Dont worry bro, we never had heheehhe I never eaven noticed you were bitter,,,,,you must be one swell guy heheeh Take care man, Vashi, eternal warriors
ygData.messageBody:
Dont worry bro, we never had heheehhe

I never eaven noticed you were bitter,,,,,you must be one swell guy heheeh

Take care man,

Vashi, eternal warriors

>From: Nick Morgowicz <nomorgow@...>
>
>Heya all, I'd like to apologize on my bitter and mean attitude yesterday.
>Things were not going well in the office and I was frustrated from waking
>up at 5am to try to get the Tomahawk before work.
>
>I hope you still have some respect for me :)
>
>Nick
>
